title: 问题CraftTweaker2
author: nai_niu
txt_content: CraftTweaker2的recipes.removeByMod(MODID); 其中MODid指的是什么呢？

replies.author: xmdhs
阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
是mod的modid即mod的标识符

在mcmod.info里面有

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
用压缩软件打开 mod ，找到 mcmod.info 。

其中    
    "modid": "tconstruct",
    "name": "Tinkers' Construct",
    "description": "A little of this, a little of that, a lot of tinkering, and a lot of tools",

很明显了

replies.author: nai_niu
replies.txt_content:
recipes.removeByMod(ebwizardry);
巫术学mcmod.info

[
{
  "modid" : "ebwizardry",
  "name" : "Electroblob's Wizardry",
  "version" : "4.2.7",
  "mcversion" : "1.12.2",
  "url" : "https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/electroblobs-wizardry",
  "credits" : "
Designed, coded and textured by Electroblob.
Code contributed by: Corail31, 12foo, Shadows-of-Fire, Tora-B, Avatair, Aeronica, UltraHex, Azim-Palmer.
Translators: MadWrist (Spanish, Mexican Spanish), VilagVil & kellixon (Russian), Hahdrim (French), lorrampi (Brazilian Portuguese), ZHENGLOC & dragon-evol (Chinese), shejery & rewi_wire (Korean), Trozuu (Polish).",
  "authorList" : [
    "Electroblob"
  ],
  "description" : "Electroblob's Wizardry adds an rpg-style system of magic spells to Minecraft with the aim of being as playable as possible. No crazy constructs, no perk trees, no complex recipes - simply find spell books, cast spells, and master the arcane!",
  "logoFile" : "assets/ebwizardry/textures/gui/logo.png"
}
]
报错
[INITIALIZATION][CLIENT][ERROR] delete\main.zs:1 > could not find ebwizardry
